item.title: Trump Shares Huckabee's Lengthy Text Message of Praise
item.description: On his social media site, President Donald Trump shared a screenshot of the text from Mike Huckabee, the U.S. ambassador to Israel.

item.title: Trump Contradicts Gabbard on Iranian Nuclear Weapons
item.description: President Donald Trump contradicted his Director of National Intelligence Tulsi Gabbard, Tuesday, on Iran's nuclear weapons capabilities.

item.title: Rep. Huizenga to Newsmax: Better for US Not to Take Military Action Against Iran
item.description: It is much preferable that the United States stay out of any military activity against Iran in the current war, Rep. Bill Huizenga told Newsmax on Tue...

item.title: Dems Plot to Stop Trump's 'Pocket Rescission'
item.description: Democrats are gearing up to stop President Donald Trump's use of "pocket rescission" to cut waste, fraud, and abuse.

item.title: Report: DHS Lifts Pause on Workforce Site Raids
item.description: The U.S. Department of Homeland Security on Monday told staff it will reverse guidance issued last week that agents were not to conduct immigration ra...
